titleStmt.title: Cambridge, Gonville and Caius College, MS 205

msItem.title: Kalendar; Glanvill; further miscellaneous contents, with Magna carta, carta foresta, and Merton among them.

history.provenance: Provenance: Early assoc. with Shorwell, Isle of Wight; gift of William Moore, 1659.

listBibl.bibl: Bibliography: James, G&C, I, p. 238–40; N. Denholm Young, “Robert Carpenter and the Provisions of Westminster,” English Historical Review (1935), pp. 22–35.

body.p:
Cambridge, Gonville and Caius College
MS 205/111. Kalendar; Glanvill; further miscellaneous contents, with Magna carta, carta foresta, and Merton among them. 243 + xvi ff. 170 x 127 mm. Text block 128 x 94 mm.
Provenance: Early assoc. with Shorwell, Isle of Wight; gift of William Moore, 1659.
Bibliography: James, G&C, I, p. 238–40; N. Denholm Young, “Robert Carpenter and the Provisions of Westminster,” English Historical Review (1935), pp. 22–35.
